sentences.en: But at the moment he had other things to preoccupy him.
sentences.cn: 不过当时有另外的事情分了他的心.

sentences.en: But it is not hearts and minds in Kabul and Kandahar that most preoccupy the PM now, but hearts and minds much closer to home.
sentences.cn: 但如今在首相的心中，最值得全神贯注的地方显然不在喀什穆和坎大哈，而是在国内。

sentences.en: Crime and the fear of crime preoccupy the community.
sentences.cn: 犯罪和对犯罪的恐惧一直困扰着这个社区。

sentences.en: Otherwise, thoughts of attack and counter - attack will preoccupy him and people his entire world.
sentences.cn: 否则, 攻击与 反 攻击的念头便会盘踞他及他整个周遭世界.

words.tran_cn: 全神贯注的；心事重重的；被先占的
先入为主；全神贯注；极为忙碌（等于preoccupation）
全神贯注，入神；当务之急；关注的事物；抢先占据；成见
抢先占有；使…全神贯注（preoccupy的过去式）

trans.tran_en: if something preoccupies someone, they think or worry about it a lot

trans.tran_cn: 占据（某人）思想，使对…全神贯注，使专心于
